text: Columba Macbeth-Green (born 30 June 1968) is an Australian Roman Catholic bishop of the Pauline Fathers, who currently serves as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Wilcannia-Forbes. Until the episcopal ordination of Bishop Richard Umbers on 24 August 2016, Bishop Macbeth-Green was the youngest Catholic bishop in Australia.http://www.catholic- hierarchy.org/country/bau12.html ==References== Category:Roman Catholic bishops in Australia Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Columba Macbeth-Green
